Error.Message: new 和 Scanner(System in)之間要空格 Scanner scanner= new Scanner(System.in);
應改為 KKBox bb = KKBox(); bb.x=length; bb.y = width; bb.z=height; system.out.println("體積"+bb.volume()); system.out.println("表面積："+bb.surfaceArea());
